page.title: 19EVENTS IN CRUWYS MORCHARD
page.content: The Parish Church has held the following events: Sacred Concert of church music, organ recital, choir of children. Church flowers are provided by parish ladies, with special efforts for Easter, Harvest Festival, Flower Festival and Christmas. The Annual Fete is well supported, with fancy dress, dog show, majorettes' display and an exhibition of ancient parish documents from Devon Record Office. A clay pigeon shoot is held annually plus skittles, barbecue and draw. Money from these go to church funds. Other local entertainments taking place are the concert, with WI, YFC and others, the Flower Show and Dance, a Barn Dance, the Harvest Thanksgiving with service, sports, tea and dance, and the WI Christmas party. A donkey derby, a 50-50 auction and the 200 club raise funds for the Parish Hall.
